title: The WZNW model as an integrable perturbation of the Witten conformal point
abstract: We show that the WZNW model with arbitrary $\sigma$-model coupling constant may be viewed as a $\sigma$-model perturbation of the WZNW theory around the Witten conformal point. In order for the $\sigma$-model perturbation to be relevant, the level $k$ of the underlying affine algebra has to be negative. We prove that in the large $|k|$ limit the perturbed WZNW system with negative $k$ flows to the conformal WZNW model with positive level. The flow appears to be integrable due to the existence of conserved currents satisfying the Lax equation. This fact is in a favorable agreement with the integrability of the WZNW model discovered by Polyakov and Wiegmann within the Bethe ansatz technique.
